# CODEC Landing Page Project Instructions

This is a Next.js project for the CODEC (Congresso de Desenvolvimento nos Esportes de Contato) landing page.

## Project Structure
- Modern Next.js with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Responsive design for martial arts congress
- Focus on accessibility and social responsibility

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React components and hooks
- Implement responsive design principles
- Follow accessibility best practices
- Maintain clean, semantic HTML structure
- Use Brazilian Portuguese for content

## Key Features
- Event information display
- Registration integration
- Speaker profiles
- Social responsibility messaging
- Mobile-responsive design
